definition: to roll steel (into sheets or bars)
to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle

sentences.english: Avoid shock loading and high overloads during mill operation.
sentences.chinese: 軋鋼時，避免衝擊負荷及過負荷運作。

sentences.english: It makes the system of steel rolling working in best value nearby.
sentences.chinese: 使軋鋼系統工作在最佳值附近。

sentences.english: In the heating process of rolling reduction of fuel consumption and ignition loss is of great significance.
sentences.chinese: 軋鋼加熱過程中，降低燃耗與燒損具有重要意義。

sentences.english: The quality of the rolling bearings is directly related to the operation condition of the rolling mill.
sentences.chinese: 滾動軸承狀態的好壞直接關係到軋鋼機運行的質量。

sentences.english: Applicable for bearings in working conditions of rolling mill.
sentences.chinese: 適合軋鋼廠軸承的工況條件。

sentences.english: The experiences to use converter gas in heating furnace of the rod rolling mill in Tangshan Iron and Steel Company are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了唐鋼棒材軋鋼加熱爐燒轉爐煤氣的經驗。

sentences.english: A heavy steel rolling mill is being built .
sentences.chinese: 一座大型軋鋼廠正在建設中。

sentences.english: The practical production show that the converter gas can be used in reheating furnace of steel rolling.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證明，軋鋼加熱爐使用轉爐煤氣是可行的。

sentences.english: C. All tankage and connecting flumes are boiler plate.
sentences.chinese: 所有筒槽和與之相連接的水槽爲平軋鋼板製造。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a vertical roller of a rolling mill.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及軋鋼機立輥。

sentences.english: Joe's beloved mother has recently died in a steel- mill accident.
sentences.chinese: 喬的母親剛剛死於軋鋼事故。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to one kind of roller way billet heat insulating apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種軋鋼廠輥道鋼坯的保溫裝置。
